definition: room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy
"roof" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 40), occurring in 家, 定, 安 etc/see also 寶蓋|宝盖[bao3 gai4]

definition: house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]
to handle official business/to work (esp. in an office)

building (a relatively large, multi-storey one)/CL:幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
